Compared to the same period one year ago, the median home sales price decreased 4.2%, or $5,450, and the number of home sales decreased 43.2%. There are currently 117 resale and new homes in Wayland on Trulia, including 12 homes in the pre-foreclosure, auction, or bank-owned stages of the foreclosure process.
